content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Plate Production Area (Position x=1-5, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- 3 stone furnaces at positions (1.0,1.0), (3.0,1.0), and (5.0,1.0)
- 3 burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5), (3.5,2.5), and (5.5,2.5)
- 3 wooden chests at positions (1.5,3.5), (3.5,3.5), and (5.5,3.5)
Currently producing and storing iron plates

###Copper Plate Production Area (Position x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- 2 stone furnaces at positions (2.0,7.0) and (4.0,7.0)
- 2 burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- 2 wooden chests at positions (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5)
- Additional burner inserter at (3.5,9.5) for transferring between chests
Currently storing copper plates

###Assembly Line System (Position x=8.5-21.5, y=10.5-15.5)
Complex production line consisting of:
- Multiple wooden chests at positions (8.5,10.5), (14.5,11.5), (21.5,11.5), (11.5,13.5), (11.5,14.5), (17.5,14.5)
- Multiple burner inserters at positions (9.5,10.5), (10.5,13.5), (14.5,12.5), (12.5,14.5), (16.5,14.5), (21.5,13.5)
- Two assembling machines:
  - Copper cable assembler at (14.5,14.5)
  - Electronic circuit assembler at (21.5,15.5)
Currently set up for copper cable and electronic circuit production

###Power Generation System (Position x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at (7.0,35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam transport
Currently not fully operational due to lack of fuel

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- Check if a position is already occupied before placing new entities
- When placing inserters next to existing entities, ensure proper spacing and no conflicts with existing inserters

### Resource/Item Availability Errors
- Ensure required items (like transport belts) are in inventory before attempting to place them
- Keep track of inventory contents before attempting construction operations

### Power System Issues
- Boiler requires fuel to operate
- Steam engine needs proper fluid connections to function
- Ensure power network is properly connected with electric poles

### Production Line Issues
- Assembling machines require power to operate
- Ensure proper resource supply chains are established before starting production
- Check that inserters have appropriate fuel when using burner inserters
